summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of Y-Store O13-O18 modules: Guard (fraud/KPI incidents), Risk scoring, Timeline, Analytics Intelligence. All APIs work correctly with admin authentication and return proper data structures.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: External REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL returns 404 for all /api/* endpoints
flaky_endpoints.workaround: APIs work correctly on localhost:8001 - routing/proxy configuration issue

passed_tests: Authentication protection on all admin endpoints (403 without token)
success_percentage: backend: 100% (15/15 core features tested), all O13-O18 module APIs fully functional
action_item_for_main_agent: External API routing issue: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL (https://jjjjjjjj-uvmgh.preview.emergentagent.com) returns 404 for all /api/* endpoints. Internal APIs work perfectly on localhost:8001. This will prevent frontend from accessing backend APIs. Check Kubernetes ingress configuration or proxy settings for /api/* path routing.
